specialRules.name: Barrage (4) (12")
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a Volley Action, making a number of Attack rolls equal to its Barrage value multiplied by the Regiment's number of Stands.

specialRules.name: Loose Formation
specialRules.description: When a Stand performs a Volley Action against a Regiment with this Special Rule it halves the X value in its Barrage (X) Special Rule (rounding up) to a minimum of 1.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: Enemy Stands in contact with this Stand reduce their Defense Characteristic by 1 when making Defense rolls against Hits inflicted by this Stand.

specialRules.name: Deadly Blades
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any failed Defense Roll of "6" rolled by the Target Regiment causes it to suffer 2 Wounds instead of 1.

specialRules.name: Vanguard (4)
specialRules.description: When a Regiment with this Special Rule enters the Battlefield from Reinforcements, add +4 to its March Characteristic for the first March Action this Activation.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Animate Vessel
specialRules.description: All Regiments and Character Stands in the Army with the Animate Vessel Special Rule gain the Terrifying (1) Special Rule and may not perform the Inspire Action.

specialRules.name: Barrage (3) (12", Sureshot)
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a Volley Action, making a number of Attack rolls equal to its Barrage value multiplied by the Regiment's number of Stands. Has Sureshot special rule.

specialRules.name: Devout
specialRules.description: When a Regiment with this Special Rule is the Target of a Priest (X)'s Spellcasting Action, one failed Spellcasting die is converted to a success.

specialRules.name: Loose Formation
specialRules.description: When a Stand performs a Volley Action against a Regiment with this Special Rule it halves the X value in its Barrage (X) Special Rule (rounding up) to a minimum of 1.

specialRules.name: Priest (Variable)
specialRules.description: This Regiment can perform the Spellcasting Action during its Activation. Gains the Priest (X) Special Rule where X is +2 per Stand to a maximum of Priest (12).

specialRules.name: Animate Vessel
specialRules.description: All Regiments and Character Stands in the Army with the Animate Vessel Special Rule gain the Terrifying (1) Special Rule and may not perform the Inspire Action.

specialRules.name: Aura of Death (5)
specialRules.description: At the start of an Enemy Regiment's "Draw Command Card" step, if it is in contact with one or more Enemy Regiment with this Special Rule, it suffers 5 Hits.

specialRules.name: Devout
specialRules.description: When a Regiment with this Special Rule is the Target of a Priest (X)'s Spellcasting Action, one failed Spellcasting die is converted to a success.

specialRules.name: Loose Formation
specialRules.description: When a Stand performs a Volley Action against a Regiment with this Special Rule it halves the X value in its Barrage (X) Special Rule (rounding up) to a minimum of 1.

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: Enemy Stands in contact with this Stand reduce their Defense Characteristic by 1 when making Defense rolls against Hits inflicted by this Stand.

specialRules.name: Priest (Variable)
specialRules.description: This Regiment can perform the Spellcasting Action during its Activation. Gains the Priest (X) Special Rule where X is +2 per Stand to a maximum of Priest (12).

name: Legionnaires

specialRules.name: Animate Vessel
specialRules.description: All Regiments and Character Stands in the Army with the Animate Vessel Special Rule gain the Terrifying (1) Special Rule and may not perform the Inspire Action.

specialRules.name: Shield
specialRules.description: Stands in this Regiment, including Character Stands, count their Defense Characteristic as 1 point higher against all Hits originating from the Regiment's front Arc.

specialRules.name: Support (2)
specialRules.description: This Regiment's Stands contribute 2 Supporting Attacks during a Clash Action instead of 1.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Standard Bearer
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand includes a Standard Bearer.

officerUpgrades: Any Legionnaires Regiment may take one of the following Officers: Dark Cenotaph (20 points), Profane Reliquary (25 points), Optio (15 points)

name: Praetorian Guard

specialRules.name: Animate Vessel
specialRules.description: All Regiments and Character Stands in the Army with the Animate Vessel Special Rule gain the Terrifying (1) Special Rule and may not perform the Inspire Action.

specialRules.name: Shield
specialRules.description: Stands in this Regiment, including Character Stands, count their Defense Characteristic as 1 point higher against all Hits originating from the Regiment's front Arc.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

drawEvents.name: Bastion (+1)
drawEvents.description: Until the end of the Round, all Stands in this Regiment gain +1 Defense.

officerUpgrades: Any Praetorian Guard Regiment may take one of the following Officers: Standard Bearer (10 points), Icon Bearer (10 points), Dark Cenotaph (25 points), Profane Reliquary (25 points)

specialRules.name: Animate Vessel
specialRules.description: All Regiments and Character Stands in the Army with the Animate Vessel Special Rule gain the Terrifying (1) Special Rule and may not perform the Inspire Action.

specialRules.name: Flurry
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule Re-Rolls all failed Hit Rolls when performing a Clash or Duel Action.

specialRules.name: Tenacious (1)
specialRules.description: Whenever this Regiment makes a Defense Roll, treat 1 failed results as successes.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Standard Bearer
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand includes a Standard Bearer.

drawEvents.name: Parry
drawEvents.description: Enemy Stands engaged with a Stand with this Special Rule cannot Re-Roll failed Hit Rolls.

name: Varangian Guard

specialRules.name: Animate Vessel
specialRules.description: All Regiments and Character Stands in the Army with the Animate Vessel Special Rule gain the Terrifying (1) Special Rule and may not perform the Inspire Action.

specialRules.name: Cleave (2)
specialRules.description: Enemy Stands in contact with this Stand reduce their Defense Characteristic by 2 when making Defense rolls against Hits inflicted by this Stand.

specialRules.name: Hardened (1)
specialRules.description: When this Regiment makes a Defense Roll, reduce any Cleave (X), Brutal Impact (X) or Armor Piercing (X) Special Rule by 1 when resolving that Defense Roll.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

drawEvents.name: Cleave (+1) and Linebreaker
drawEvents.description: This Regiment gains Cleave (+1) and Linebreaker Special Rules until the end of the Round.

officerUpgrades: Any Varangian Guard Regiment may take the following Officer: Standard Bearer (10 points), Dark Cenotaph (25 points)

specialRules.name: Animate Vessel
specialRules.description: All Regiments and Character Stands in the Army with the Animate Vessel Special Rule gain the Terrifying (1) Special Rule and may not perform the Inspire Action.

specialRules.name: Barrage (3) (20", Armor Piercing (2))
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a Volley Action, making a number of Attack rolls equal to its Barrage value. Has Armor Piercing (2) special rule.

specialRules.name: Divine Shard
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule is destroyed, if the Power Token gained from it is allocated to the Fallen Pantheon Pool add an additional Power Token to that same Pool.

drawEvents.name: Barrage (+1) and Fluid Formation
drawEvents.description: This Regiment gains Barrage (+1) and Fluid Formation Special Rules until the end of the Round.

specialRules.name: Animate Vessel
specialRules.description: All Regiments and Character Stands in the Army with the Animate Vessel Special Rule gain the Terrifying (1) Special Rule and may not perform the Inspire Action.

specialRules.name: Blessed
specialRules.description: Once per Round, Stands with this Special Rule may choose to Re-Roll all their failed Hit Rolls or all of their failed Defense Rolls during a Clash or Charge Action.

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: Enemy Stands in contact with this Stand reduce their Defense Characteristic by 1 when making Defense rolls against Hits inflicted by this Stand.

specialRules.name: Hardened (1)
specialRules.description: When this Regiment makes a Defense Roll, reduce any Cleave (X), Brutal Impact (X) or Armor Piercing (X) Special Rule by 1 when resolving that Defense Roll.

specialRules.name: Impact (2)
specialRules.description: When this Stand performs a successful Charge Action, before its Clash Action, it inflicts a number of automatic Hits equal to its Impact value.

specialRules.name: Divine Shard
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule is destroyed, if the Power Token gained from it is allocated to the Fallen Pantheon Pool add an additional Power Token to that same Pool.

drawEvents.name: Flawless Strikes
drawEvents.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, all Hit Rolls of "1" count the Target's Defense as 0 for that Attack.

specialRules.name: Animate Vessel
specialRules.description: All Regiments and Character Stands in the Army with the Animate Vessel Special Rule gain the Terrifying (1) Special Rule and may not perform the Inspire Action.

specialRules.name: Aura of Death (5)
specialRules.description: At the start of an Enemy Regiment's "Draw Command Card" step, if it is in contact with one or more Enemy Regiment with this Special Rule, it suffers 5 Hits.

specialRules.name: Cleave (2)
specialRules.description: Enemy Stands in contact with this Stand reduce their Defense Characteristic by 2 when making Defense rolls against Hits inflicted by this Stand.

specialRules.name: Hardened (1)
specialRules.description: When this Regiment makes a Defense Roll, reduce any Cleave (X), Brutal Impact (X) or Armor Piercing (X) Special Rule by 1 when resolving that Defense Roll.

specialRules.name: Impact (2)
specialRules.description: When this Stand performs a successful Charge Action, before its Clash Action, it inflicts a number of automatic Hits equal to its Impact value.

specialRules.name: Relentless Blows
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, each Hit Roll of "1" causes an additional automatic Hit on the Target.

specialRules.name: Unstoppable
specialRules.description: This Regiment may Re-Roll failed Charge Rolls.

drawEvents.name: Aura of Death (+3)
drawEvents.description: This Regiment gains Aura of Death (+3) Special Rule until the end of the Round.

specialRules.description: All Regiments and Character Stands in the Army with the Animate Vessel Special Rule gain the Terrifying (1) Special Rule and may not perform the Inspire Action.

specialRules.name: Brutal Impact (1)
specialRules.description: When this Stand inflicts Impact Attacks, those Impact Attacks reduce the Target Enemy Regiment's Defense by 1 for the purposes of making Defense Rolls against those Impact Attacks.

specialRules.description: Enemy Stands in contact with this Stand reduce their Defense Characteristic by 3 when making Defense rolls against Hits inflicted by this Stand.

specialRules.name: Unhallowed Ground
specialRules.description: This Regiment cannot be Healed and counts as being Size (2) regardless of its Type. In addition, this Regiment counts as five Stands for the purposes of Seizing Objective Zones.

drawEvents.description: When performing this Draw Event choose one of several effects that each inflict wounds on this Regiment but provide various bonuses.

specialRules.name: Priest (6)
specialRules.description: This Regiment or Character Stand can perform the Spellcasting Action during its Activation. The 6 value is this Stand's Magic Level.

drawEvents.name: Dark Shepherd

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: Enemy Stands in contact with this Stand reduce their Defense Characteristic by 1 when making Defense rolls against Hits inflicted by this Stand.

specialRules.name: Flank
specialRules.description: This Regiment does not contribute a die to the Reinforcement Roll.

specialRules.name: Font of Dark Power
specialRules.description: Any Power Tokens generated from the removal of a Stand belonging to a Friendly Regiment within 10" of the Fallen Divinity, must be allocated to the Fallen Pantheon Empowerment Pool.
